LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall.label: Sprinkle fuel(Small)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelSmall.description: Burns up by slight impact, and burns out quickly. It can be used as a fuse.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium.label: Sprinkle fuel(Medium)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelMedium.description: This is a mixture of wood and fuel. It will burn well.
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge.label: Sprinkle fuel(Large)
LanguageData.SprinkledFuelLarge.description: Keeps burning for a long time but is hard to burn. Sometimes it explodes when it burns..
